title: KRYK: Panthers cut Cam Newton, but that he’s healthy is even bigger news - Toronto Sun

content: Cam s cut That s big news Cam s healthy That s even bigger news Unable to find a trade partner for their face of the franchise last decade the Carolina Panthers on Tuesday afternoon cut quarterback Cam Newton the No overall NFL draft pick in a chars
